articles.title: Hassell Receives Funding for two Projects… in Outer Space - Architecture and Design
articles.description: Hassell has been awarded funding by the European Space Agency (ESA) for two new research projects that will focus on the moon.
articles.content:

articles.title: Scientists in Asia resumed work far quicker than western counterparts, international COVID lockdown - EurekAlert
articles.description: Researchers in China, Japan, and Singapore were able to resume research much quicker than their counterparts in the US and Europe after the first covid lockdowns, results of a new international survey suggest.

articles.title: Facebook, Google, Other Big Tech Firms Must Pledge to Do More to Curb False Information Through Ads: EU - Gadgets 360

articles.title: Europe and Russia plan to put spacecraft on surface of Mars - The Guardian
articles.description: Joint mission next year will try to replicate China’s recent success of landing robotic craft on planet
articles.content: Launching in September 2022, and touching down in June 2023, ExoMars consists of a rover and a surface science platform. The rover is called Rosalind Franklin and has been built by Airbus Defence and… [+536 chars]
